csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
  <citation>
    <layout prefix="(" suffix=")" >
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <names variable="author">
          <name form="short" />
        </names>
        <date variable="issued" >
          <date-part name="year" />
        </date>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
